programme.title: Cowboy Way

Bubba struggles with being away from his family for work and feels the pressure to keep their business close to home. A life-changing opportunity for Booger to compete at a world-renowned colt-starting competition leaves Cody and Bubba excited for their friend, but nervous about what it will mean for their business.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As babies continue to explore the world around them, they soon encounter many creatures, both large and small, that are extremely intriguing. Whether furry or feathered, winged or wiggly, bumpy or smooth, each holds a special fascination. Neighborhood Animals exposes little ones to animals most likely to be found close to home or in easily recognized environments.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Set off on a fun-filled "field trip" with your baby to discover animals found at the park, on the farm, and in your own backyard.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: With the Dolittle, and other Baby programs under their belts, the tots who follow Julie Aigner-Clark's Baby Einstein series will sidle up to Baby Newton expecting a similar exploration of building blocks to brilliance, but this time there's a wrinkle or two. Animation makes its first appearance, and parents steeped in keep-it-simple culture may object to the springy "I Know My Shapes" song, a departure from classical-only video predecessors.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Babies love animals, and now you can bring animals from the seven continents home to your baby. Meet dozens of exotic animals including Asian pandas, Australian kangaroos and Arctic snow monkeys...all filmed in their beautiful, natural habitats. Rhythms and songs inspired by faraway lands have been orchestrated especially for little ears and encourage your baby to sing, dance and play to the world beats. You'll laugh together at the funny puppet shows featuring moms and their baby animals.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As little ones grow, their innate sense of wonder grows too, creating an occasion for celebration with each new discovery. Baby Galileo Discovering the Sky introduces them to that remarkable canopy above us: the sun and moon, fluffy clouds, shimmering stars, colorful planets and whirling galaxies.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Dive in with your little explorer across the seas to meet amazing animals living in the ocean, coral reef, and polar regions. Overflowing with underwater footage of whales, dolphins, tropical fish, and more, Neptune's Oceans invites you and your baby on an oceanic voyage of discovery!

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: From the moment babies are born, they use their developing senses to discover the world. In terms of sight, bold patterns in contrasting colors or black and white are initially preferred. As for sounds, Mother s gentle voice, in any language, is music to baby's ears. Language Nursery: Voices From Many Lands acquaints your baby with the sounds of foreign language by presenting delightful, visually stimulating images accompanied by spoken passages, natural sounds and music.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Share a rainbow of sights and sounds with your baby as you discover the wonders of color together! Join puppet host "Vincent Van Goat" as he creates six Van Gogh masterpieces exploring red, green, blue, yellow, orange, and purple. World Of Colors is a spirited celebration of creative expression.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Between 12 and 24 months, little ones become increasingly interested in more complex ideas and begin to explore numbers and counting. Numbers Nursery introduces little ones to numerals 1 through 5 in a captivating, interactive way that invites them to join in, clap their hands and count out loud.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Every stage is an exciting adventure with your newborn. As babies grow, they absorb a wide variety of sights and sounds. And with so much to see and hear, infants seem to enjoy, and be most soothed by, gentle sounds such as your voice or pleasant, restful music. Treat your child -- and yourself -- to the delights of Baby Bach Musical Adventure, an award-winning program that exposes babies to the joy and majesty of classical music while presenting them with stimulating, colorful images.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As each day passes, babies' awareness of the world around them -- and all the wonders it holds -- continues to develop. Wild animals are especially intriguing and World Animals captures the spirtit of little ones' fascination with wild creatures as it introduces them to animals living in the jungle, in the ocean, and on the savannah.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As babies develop, their understanding of the world, and how its pieces "fit" together, continues to progress. DISCOVERING SHAPES playfully introduces five basic forms circle, oval, triangle, square and rectangle as each appears in the context of toys, nature and everyday objects.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch Sarah and Mark give their sheep a winter-feed. In Teletubbyland, the Teletubbies cannot decide whether to have Tubby Custard or Tubby Toast.

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.desc: The Teletubbies dance a jumping dance before stopping to watch Yvette wash up her plastic cups and saucers. The Teletubbies have a very messy day. So Noo-Noo has to tidy everything up.

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children making Christmas cards. Laa-Laa's present is some lovely decorations. When Noo-Noo tidies them up they tickle his throat, so he throws them out to decorate Home Hill.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Two children are making Christmas crackers for each other. Dipsy is very pleased to find his present is a cracker. He looks for someone to pull the cracker. It makes a lovely pink bang and the Teletubbies laugh when they fall over.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: A group of children sing some Christmas carols to the Teletubbies. Tinky Winky opens his present to find a beautiful star inside. The Teletubbies follow it all over Teletubbyland, but where will is end up?

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.desc: Bob goes bird-watching. / Bob, Wendy and the Machines are making the town a nicer place to live.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob, Wendy, Roley and Dizzy are finishing a new Bus Stop. / Mrs Potts's fence is behind schedule.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Beasley is having a conservatory built. / Bob and Wendy have been invited to a lunch at the Town Hall.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Muck has a sleepover with Travis. Wendy, Muck, and Dizzy put up a new signpost at the crossroads.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Bentley asks Bob and crew to build an out-of-town car park. / Bob is erecting telegraph poles with Scoop.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Wendy lays a garden path for Mrs Potts. / Bob, Wendy and the Machines make the town a nicer place to live.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: While refurbishing Farmer Pickles' cottage Bob finds a hedgehog. / Bob builds a shed in Farmer Pickles' field.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry and the girls excitedly plan to put on a "Story Time On Stage" musical play for the Berrykin kids: "Berryella and Prince Berry Charming," directed and choreographed by Plum, with musical direction by Cherry. Strawberry will play Berryella, with Lemon and Blueberry as her comically jealous stepsisters, and costume designer Raspberry as her Fairy Fashionmother.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Blueberry and Huck turn the Baby Berrykins' favorite fairy tale, "The Littlest Berrykin," into a comedy play. They pitch it to director Plum and the assembled cast and crew using a large storybook. As Huck and Blueberry narrate the story, we push in on the book and its illustrations transition into animation. In the story, the King and Queen of the Berry Patch (played by Huck and Blueberry) are retiring to the tropics.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Orange wants to spend the day teaching her puppy to fetch, but the frisky little gal doesn't seem to understand the "retrieve" part of the activity-as soon as she gets the ball, she runs out of sight and returns moments later without it. Orange gets a new ball and tries again, with the same results. Over and over, until Orange is out of balls. Puzzled and frustrated that she can't find where her pup has stashed them, she goes to enlist her friends to help her search.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Cherry Jam is being driven to distraction! She can't finish a song that she promised to write for a singing group, thanks to the earsplitting noise from Berrykin construction crews who are trying to find the sparkleberry juice blockage that has shut down the town's power. Strawberry can't cook in the café, Lemon's hair salon appliances are running out of control-life in Berry Bitty City is impossible!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: With the power completely out in Berry Bitty City, the girls go on a camping trip to be out of the way of the Berrykin work crews. Lemon is nervous because she believes there is a creepy creature in the forest (that she read about in a book Blueberry loaned her), and the girls get the nervous bug, but Strawberry turns their apprehension into fun by daring her friends to stay out in the woods the longest!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The girls are driven to distraction by their frisky puppies frolicking all over Berry Bitty City! Full of energy and thinking that everything in town is a toy for them to play with, they cause comical mayhem wherever they go. Strawberry suggests the pups need a place of their own where they can play, a dog park! The girls decide to call in Huckleberry, who runs an animal hotel in Berry Big City, to help design the park.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The girls plan a formal afternoon lawn party tea to inaugurate their new dog park. Plum is in charge of decorations, Cherry music, and Strawberry snacks. There's even a giant, dog-shaped ice sculpture. As the girls get dressed, Raspberry puts the finishing touches on the high-fashion hats that will accompany their beautiful gowns. At last everything is ready. But when the gate opens... the puppies back away!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: To convince the dance-averse Huckleberry to attend the big masquerade ball at the dog park, Blueberry promises she'll stay by his side the whole evening and make sure he doesn't have to dance. But as the day of the ball dawns, Blueberry awakens with a bad cold. She doesn't know how to tell Huck that she can't go to the ball. Lemon and Raspberry misinterpret her sniffles, thinking she's so heartbroken to be disappointing Huck that she's crying!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Berry Bitty City is abuzz as Berrykin Bloom introduces the biggest, juiciest, strangest fruit anyone has ever seen! It's the size of a house, shaped like a strawberry, colored like a watermelon and has a spiky pineapple top. "I call it the sparklestrawwaterpineberry!" says Berrykin Bloom. Princess Berrykin declares it the greatest achievement in Berryculture she's ever witnessed.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry hire twins Sweet & Sour to help out in Strawberry's café, so Strawberry will have time to appear in an internet fashion contest.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry's world-traveling cousin Apple Dumplin' stops at Berry Bitty City. What starts as a brief visit becomes a series of comical misadventures that ends with Apple finding a new home with Strawberry and her friends.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry's fashion podcast is saved by Apple, then almost sabotaged by Sweet and Sour when Lemon's "mood hair" runs amok, acting like the bickering twins, and the twins' comical argument is accidentally broadcast on the "berrynet."

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When Sour wishes she could have a birthday all her very own, her twin sister Sweet grants her wish by forgoing celebrating her birthday. But what begins as a day that Sour has always dreamed of quickly becomes a disappointment when she misses her twin. With Strawberry's help, Sour gives her birthday back to Sweet with a special surprise.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When a comedy of errors causes Orange, Plum and Cherry to arrive late to their campout, they start off their annual tradition of telling tall-tales around the campfire.

programme.sub-title: A Fabulous Day with Little Angel
programme.desc: Come sing along with baby John, his brother, Jack, and sister, Jill in Little Angel!

programme.sub-title: KiiYii Knows How to Have Fun
programme.desc: Join Kii and Yii on their action-packed adventures round the magical playmat.

programme.title: Gecko's Garage
programme.desc: Gecko's Garage is a repair shop that cares! Run by cheerful mechanic Gecko, his trusty robot sidekicks.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.sub-title: A Happy Christmas With Little Angel
programme.desc: Come sing along with baby John, his brother, Jack, and sister, Jill in Little Angel!

programme.title: Ryan's World
programme.desc: Pranks and challenges galore! Join Ryan and his family for fun and games in Ryan's World.

programme.title: Ryan's World
programme.desc: Ryan and the gang explore the world and discover wacky fun with familiar faces and brand new places!

programme.title: Toys and Colors
programme.desc: Toys and Colors teaches kids life skills, letters, numbers, and more – all in a fun and family-friendly way!

programme.title: Kids Diana Show
programme.desc: Tune in for a holiday pretend play adventure with Diana, the Princess of Play, and her brother, Roma!

programme.title: Ryan's World
programme.desc: Kid video superstar Ryan and his Ryan's World pals take you along on all their awesome learning adventures!

programme.title: Ryan's World
programme.desc: Animals everywhere! Ryan meets cool kid-friendly pets, Gus the Gummy Gators wrangles zoo animals, and more.

programme.title: Jason Vlogs
programme.desc: Jason and Alex hit the road! The brothers visit a kids museum, the zoo, get their eyesight checked and more.

programme.title: I Told You So
programme.desc: Confined to a wheelchair after a failed Halloween attempt to prove herself a reporter, What's At Heart photographer Emma sees strange goings-on through her hospital window. She's convinced the neighbors are jewel thieves, but no one believes her – till the bad guys come after her! To show her Friends on the What's At Heart school paper that she's more than just a photographer, Emma investigates a scary old house on Halloween eve -- only to take a tumble and land in the hospital. There, confined to a wheelchair, she observes mysterious goings-on through her window which convince her that the neighbors are jewel thieves. Her friends, though dubious, agree to check it out. But after nearly getting caught by the neighbors, they come up empty and decide it's all just Emma's imagination. Meanwhile, up in Maternity, Sophie's having a baby! The girls run out, leaving Emma alone. And that's when the bad guys decide to pay Emma a visit…

programme.title: Wrong Place, Wrong Time
programme.desc: When Garmadon travels back in time in order to undo the past and rid the Ninja from the future, the Ninja follow him and try to stop him by using the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon. In his most villainous attempt at using the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates a vortex through space and time to return to the moment Wu first arrives to recruit Kai to become a ninja (Episode 1, 2011) in order to rid the ninja from the future. The Ninja follow him back in time, only to make the mistake in saving Nya from the Skeletons. Suddenly, Past Kai doesn't have a need to become a ninja, so our current day heroes must fix the past to save their futures. The stakes rise as Garmadon catches wind the Ninja have followed him back in time and plans a dangerous trap. In a final battle, the ninja use the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon, causing all of the legendary weapons to shoot off into the night sky. In the end, our heroes return back to the present and learn the Mega-Weapon has ceased to exist because it was destroyed in the past, leaving them all without their elemental powers.

programme.title: Open Mike Knight
programme.desc: The Book of Betrayal leads Jestro and his Monsters to Funnyton – the funnies town in the kingdom. When they Knights arrive to capture him, they discover (to their shock) that Jestro and the Book of Monsters are now the town's top comedians! Jestro and his monsters are in attack formation moving to pillage the town of Funnyton. But when they arrive, ready to tear into the place, they see that nobody's in town. Then, they hear…laughter?! The entire town is there listening to a stand-up comic JOKES KNIGHTLY. He's hilarious. He commands such power, such attention, and such loyalty. Jestro and the BOM decide they must become funny. They order all kinds of book on comedy from Spamazon: books on parody, irony, insult humor, slapstick, satire, knock-knock jokes, elephant jokes, “my monster is so fat” jokes, etc. They work-up a ventriloquist act with the BOM sitting on Jestro's lap. They start doing their act and, surprisingly, they're funny. They're very funny. The Fortrex arrives and the knights rush out, ready for battle. They fight through a string of monsters just outside the town, but discover they're only working as “bouncers” to keep too many people out of the comedy club. (“Sorry, you guys aren't on the list.”) The knights hear loud laughs and head there. In the club, they discover the town isn't being held hostage, they're in the show voluntarily having a great time. And…Jestro and the BOM are funny. Meanwhile, during the show, Jokes Knightly decides he'll steal the BOM and Jestro's act. During the intermission at the comedy show, Clay comes backstage to talk to Jestro. Maybe, Clay says, this shows that Jestro doesn't have to be bad…he is funny, like Clay always said he was. Meanwhile, Jokes Knightly steals the BOM and Jestro can't find it. He panics. Clay encourages him…go on stage alone, be funny…he can do it! Jestro goes out and is funny on his own he hits all his punchlines, he gets big laughs he starts to see that Clay is right. The BOM sees that Jokes Knightly has a “joke book” that turns out to be the BOOK OF BETRAYAL. That's how Mike Knight has become so funny – by stealing everyone's material! BOM calls in Magmar, who saves him from Mike Knight AND takes the Book of Betrayal. As Jestro comes off-stage to great applause, the BOM tells him they have the Book of Betrayal. The BOM calls in Magmar and his monsters and they start a fight as Clay comes to Jestro's defense and calls on the other Knights for backup. A big battle ensues that destroys the comedy club in Funnyton. The Knights win and drive-off Magmar, the monsters and the BOM. As they retreat, the BOM looks around: “Where's my Jestro?!” Jestro sneaked away during the fight and is in a nearby forest with…the Book of Betrayal.

programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all – the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: The Stone Army
programme.desc: The ninja face off with an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior that the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has brought to life while Garmadon manages to find a fabled Dark Island that is said to hold dark powers. Lord Garmadon struggles controlling the Serpentine now that he is without the Mega-Weapon. His latest endeavor is to lead the snakes in search of a fabled Dark Island that ancient texts say holds dark powers. Unable to find the island, the furious Serpentine abandon Lord Garmadon out at sea. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are called to the museum to find the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has seeped into the ground beneath the city, and it's brought an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior to life! Our heroes come across Misako, Lloyd's long lost mother. She's an archeologist in search of stopping the prophesized battle between Lloyd and his father. She had unearthed the Stone Warrior, and shares how it was once part of an indestructible army created by a dark spirit named The Overlord. When the balance is altered and evil is let into Ninjago, it will allow the Overlord to return and bring darkness and destruction to the land. Unable to destroy the Terminator-like Stone Warrior, the Ninja cleverly trap it. In the end, Lord Garmadon awakens on a small island at sea and hears the voice of the banished Overlord, promising him his wildest dreams. Garmadon uses his four hands to activate a mechanism, raising a lost land from out of the sea, creating a Yin/Yang symbol with Ninjago. The ultimate battle between good and evil begins to unfold.

programme.title: The Fortrex And The Furious
programme.desc: In a massive chase around Knighton, the NEXO-Knights attempt to keep the Book of Betrayal out of the Book of Monster's grip. But the evil book is persistent. Will he get the final piece of his evil puzzle? We finally REVEAL that Jestro has given the Book of Betrayal to…Clay. He tells Clay what it is and how Mike Knight used it. And it seems that the Book of Monsters believed it to be the final ingredient in some ‘Master Plan.” Suddenly, they realize Monsters – led by Magmar and the super-mad Book of Monster – are after them! Clay retreats with Jestro and the Book of Betrayal to rendezvous with the other Knights at the Fortrex. The Fortrex isn't fast enough they'll need their own vehicles. They decide that they need to split up and go in multiple directions to make the monsters expend their resources on a chase. It's a huge chase, being covered like a crazy news event by the Knighton News Network. We see a montage of the monsters stopping and capturing all the Knights vehicles: Aaron, Macy, Lance…finally Axl. However, as they do, they realize that the Knights have used Squirebots in Jestro Fan Jester hats (from the vendor at the comedy club in 108) as decoys. They think Axl has the Book of Betrayal in his BRICK containment unit, but it turns out to be the Ned Knightly Comic from episode 203. The Monsters finally corner Clay, who has the real Jestro and Book of Betrayal in his sword vehicle. Before Clay can protest, Jestro pushes the launch button and fires off Clay in the vehicle's rocket sword. The monsters race off with Jestro, leaving the shocked Clay fearing for his friend. Now, Magmar tells the Book of Monsters, they only need to get BOB. Clay makes his way back to the Fortrex and tells what has happened. They decide they must get to the Redoubt of Ruination in the Lava Lands and try to save Jestro. Meanwhile, we see, INTERCUT, a scene where Merlok 2.0 and the Book of Monsters explain the Books of Evil, how they were created and what the BOM will use them for. Merlok, back in the day, split the evil MONSTRUX into 10 magic books to keep him from ever being a threat. Only, he didn't destroy the books…and now the BOM has them and Monstrux can come back into the world! Meanwhile, the BOM has set up the huge, ceremonial arena at their HQ so they can have the ceremony to bring Monstrux back into the world. Jestro realizes he's been a pawn of the Book of Monsters. Jestro says he'll never get the Book of Betrayal…the Knights have it. In the last scene, we see Clay taking the Book of Betrayal from the Fortrex, climbing into his vehicle and driving towards…the Redoubt of Ruination! Has the Book of Betrayal worked its evil magic on him?!

programme.title: Midwinter Night's Dream
programme.desc: When Emma accidentally causes Olivia to lose an important science prize, a furious Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends. But after a New Year's Eve dream, in which a living, breathing Zobo takes her on a tour of her past, present and potential future, Olivia is reminded that friendship is the most valuable prize of all. Today is the most important day of Olivia's life. Not because tonight is New Year's Eve, but it's also the day of the annual Robotics Challenge, when teen scientists compete to build the best robot and win a full university scholarship. Olivia has spent the whole year preparing her entry: an all-new, high-tech, flying Aviator Zobo. It's a sure winner – until Emma accidentally sabotages it and wins the trophy herself! Furious, Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends (for defending Emma), and stomps out in tears. That night, in a dream, a living, breathing Aviator Zobo takes her on a tour of her life – past, present and potential future – to remind her that friendship is the most valuable prize of all.

programme.title: The Day Ninjago Stood Still
programme.desc: The ninja try to flee from the rest of the Stone Army that has been brought to life by the Devourer's toxic venom - and things get a lot worse when Garmadon arrives with a ‘Helmet of Darkness' and seizes control of the Stone Army. Scales finally takes leadership over the Serpentine and plans to burrow beneath Ninjago City to level it to the ground. But as they burrow, they run into a lost chamber holding the rest of the Stone Army. The Devourer's toxic venom in the ground brings the Stone Army to life, sealing the Serpentine in their tomb, and returning the snakes back to where they were first found. On the Dark Island, the Overlord directs Lord Garmadon to a giant celestial clock. Garmadon removes a ‘Helmet of Darkness', which will grant the wearer control over the Stone Army, and also activate the clock to tick down to when the final battle will begin. Back in Ninjago City, the indestructible Stone Army surfaces and attacks, and the Ninja know the only thing they can do is to save as many people as they can. They manage to barely escape with other townspeople, only for the Destiny's Bounty's engines to get damaged. In the end, Lord Garmadon arrives with the helmet, and seizes control of the Stone Army.

programme.title: Kingdom Of Heroes
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters, having the final pieces of his evil plan in place, tries to take human form. Can the NEXO-Knights and Merlok 2.0 stop the greatest threat they've ever faced? Or will the kingdom be plunged into darkness…forever. The Redoubt of Ruination readies the final ceremony to call forth MONSTRUX, the arch-necromancer of the past. Clay, holding the Book of Betrayal walks to the gates of the spooky place. Inside, Clay hears strange…singing and music. It's like a twisted Broadway show of some kind. Meanwhile, the Knights all realize Clay is gone and so is the Book of Betrayal. Macy says Clay must be up to something. They have to trust him and, more importantly, they have to find him. At the Redoubt of Ruination the ceremony has already begun! The Book of Monsters wants the final ceremony that calls forth Monstrux to be like a really great show! The BOM then barfs up all the BOOKS OF EVIL into their places around Jestro. He's just missing the BOOK OF BETRAYAL, which Clay has. Clay says he'll trade the book for Jestro. The BOM immediately agrees to the deal and sets Jestro free. Then, Monsters grab-up Clay, restrain him, and put him in Jestro's place on the sacrifice stone. From outside, they're interrupted by the sounds of battle the Knights have arrived on the Fortrex and are attacking the Redoubt of Ruination. In the confusion, Jestro slips away. The BOM lets loose with a powerful protection spell to keep the Knights out as he starts with the ceremony…he's going to bring Monstrux out and remanifest him in Clay's body! Jestro is able to escape the Redoubt and make his way to the Knights, who can't seem to battle their way in. It's a race against time as the Knights try to get in and save Clay. As the Knights get in, they see that the crazy BOM is absorbing all the Books of Evil, one-by-one. He grows BIGGER and BIGGER! Macy calls for NEXO-Power…but it's not enough! The gigantic Book of Monsters sucks down the final book, the Book of Betrayal! He looms over Clay, about to consume him, too, and make him into Monstrux! Suddenly, Robin appears carrying TECHKALIBER…he tosses it to Clay. Just as the huge Book of Monsters falls on Clay, he holds up Techkaliber and Merlok 2.0 is there…his full power in the sword. Clay sticks the sword into the Book of Monster's huge mouth. BOOM! There's a BIG, MAGICAL EXPLOSION! As we cut back inside, we see the Book of Monsters is gone. The Knights release Clay and he thanks them and Jestro for saving him. Jestro thanks them all for saving him and seeing the good in him. WE DISSOLVE TO: The JoustDome. In a final ceremony the King and Queen reward the knights and congratulate them for keeping the kingdom safe. There are speeches, happiness and friendship. And Jestro even does a bit that's funny. At the very end we see a hint of something…Monstrux and the Book of Monsters are still out there.

programme.title: The Last Voyage
programme.desc: The Ninjas, Lloyd, Sensei Wu and Misako journey to the Dark Island to find a ‘Temple of Light' that can restore the Ninjas' elemental powers but are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like star fish) that start eating through their ship. The Stone Army and Lord Garmadon have disappeared, and our heroes can see the mysterious Dark Island off their coastline. Fearing Garmadon is up to no good, Sensei Wu has the whole team suit up to begin a journey to the Dark Island. Since the Bounty's engines are damaged, they plan to go by sea. Misako reveals her ancient scrolls state of a ‘Temple of Light' that could return the Ninja's elemental powers, and it could be found on the island. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon has the Army mining for more ‘Dark Matter', using it to build a Super-Weapon that will recreate Ninjago in a twisted evil way. When a storm hits at sea, our heroes are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like starfish that can eat through a ship) and are forced to find refuge on a lighthouse at sea. Inside, Zane discovers his inventor father, the Tinkerer, is alive! Together, they repair the Bounty so it can fly again, escaping a giant Leviathan, and soaring to the Dark Island ahead.

programme.title: The Cloud
programme.desc: A storm is brewing over Knighton. Monstrox has taken the form of a cloud, and is raising an army of lightning infused Stone Monsters. His first target is the new Lavalands Amusement Park. Harmony reigns in Knighton as the Knights pursue their civilian lives: Lance has a TV talk show Axl is the singing chef on the show Jestro is the weatherman Clay is teaching at the Knights' Academy Macy, Ava and Merlok 2.0 travel the land in the Fortrex making sure the kingdom's defenses are ready (part of a plan she and Clay have) Aaron and his hover shield is travelling the land setting extreme records. Robin is at his workshop at the Knights' Academy doing an “independent study” – he's working on some top secret project for Merlok 2.0. It all seems excellent! We even see the Knights new vehicles – which have been optimized for civilian life (except for Clay's.) But storm clouds are brewing. Well, one storm cloud is brewing: the Cloud of Monstrox! Yes, the Book of Monsters has reconstituted himself and is now a cloud who needs a man on the ground to enact his new evil plan. He follows his old buddy Jestro as he goes across the realm on the weekends apologizing for being evil. ZAP! With one bolt of his evil magic lighting, the Cloud of Monstrox turns Jestro evil again (only this time a bit, well, too evil.) The evil duo are back together – and bring stone to life for the first time in the form of Gargoyles from the town of GHOULIA. Now they must gather the Forbidden Powers so that the Cloud of Monstrox can destroy the entire kingdom! A battle breaks out in the Lava Lands, where Lance and Alice Squires are reporting from the opening of the Cuthbert Richmond funded Lava Lands Amusement Park, rebuilt from the remains of Jestro's old HQ. Jestro and the Cloud are after something in the remains and as Merlok 2.0 sends out a call for the Knights to help Lance. Can Lance (with an assist from King Halbert in his Mech) hold-off Jestro, the Cloud and their new army of stone fighters?!

programme.title: The Island Of Darkness
programme.desc: After battling off Garmadon's Stone Army, the Ninjas finally arrive at the Temple of Light where they harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd who becomes more powerful than he ever imagined. The Ninja camouflage the Bounty, creating a secret rebel base on the island. Misako says they must find the Temple of Light, because only when their elemental powers return, will they be strong enough to defeat the indestructible Stone Army. The Ninja search the dark, exotic island and come across Garmadon's compound, where they're building the Super-Weapon. The Ninja discover the Temple of Light is hidden at the highest peak of the island, and the Tinkerer aids their trek in creating a Drill Dozer so they can travel underground unnoticed. A final chase and battle takes place at the Temple of Light, as the Ninja solve the puzzle and harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd, who also becomes more powerful then he ever imagined. Their new abilities can destroy the indestructible Stone Warriors. Although Lord Garmadon finds this to be a setback, the Overlord reassures him darkness will prevail, as we end on seeing the Celestial Clock ticking down closer to zero.

programme.title: A Little Rusty
programme.desc: The Cloud of Monstrox and Jestro unlocks a mysterious Forbidden Power. What kind ofhavoc will they unleash? And can Merlok 2.0 and the NEXO KNIGHTS make the new COMBO NEXO Powers work? The Knights finally make it to the Lava Lands – using their various new forms of transport, which are all strictly civilian vechicles – and they must regroup and learn to fight together again to face the new threat of Jestro, the Cloud of Monstrox, and their STONE MONSTERS (in this case, Stone Gargoyles.) But Jestro and his monsters beat back the knights and recover the STAFF OF MONSTROX – which was buried under the ceremonial chamber from Episode 210 (and is now the Lava Puker amusement park ride) – and they get away on Jestro's EVIL MOBILE, which he recovers from the HQ garage. Macy says this is exactly why she's been touring the kingdom preparing everyone for the next attack. The Knights have to get it together because now the entire kingdom is under threat…again. Robin decides he must upgrade the Knights' vehicles and make them more “fight optimized.” Ava and Merlok 2.0 must figure out how to use new NEXO Powers because regular NEXO Powers do make Stone monsters back into stone, but the Cloud simply zaps them to life again. Meanwhile, in the IRON MOUNTAINS, Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find the first of the Forbidden Powers: RELENTLESS RUST. They find the ROGUL STATUE holding the power and zap him to life. Now…they can rust those shiny knights to pieces! Ava and Merlok are attempting to use NEXO COMBO POWERS – with hilarious results – as they try to figure out how they might work. When Jestro attacks, he's able to halt the Fortrex by instantly rusting its tracks and wheels! Robin has his hands full trying to clean all the rust from the attack of Relentless Rust. As the Knights attempt to defend against Jestro, the Cloud is zapping statues to life. He hits a statue with a bolt of lightning as Clay is touching it. Something happens…Clay feels odd stiff as if rock is mixing with his body. Finally, Ava and Merlok 2.0 download to the Knights their new thing: a COMBO NEXO COMBO Power. It works! It can smash the animated statues to dust! They use it to defeat Jestro, but he and the Cloud get away with the Forbidden Power of Relentless Rust. Victory … sort of. Clay talks to Merlok 2.0…something has happened to him. What can they do? Merlok 2.0 is very concerned.

programme.title: The Last Hope
programme.desc: When the Ninjas' attempt to return Garmadon's ‘Helmet of Darkness' to its perch at the Celestial Clock in order to prevent the final battle between Lloyd and his father from beginning fails, a Super Weapon is created that can destroy all of Ninjago. With the Overlord and Garmadon nearing completion of the Super-Weapon, Misako tells the group she thinks there could be one last chance at preventing Lloyd's final battle with his father. She believes if they can steal the helmet off Garmadon's head and return it to it's rightful perch on the Celestial Clock, it could stop the clock before it reaches zero, thus preventing the final battle from beginning. Dressed as Warriors, the Ninja escort their ‘captive' Misako to Garmadon, and the heroes see glimpses of the Super-Weapon being built. In a thrilling escape, Misako cleverly steals Garmadon's helmet, and they race to the Celestial Clock. Lloyd has a brief encounter with his father, and hesitates striking him. When they return the helmet to its rightful perch, they're one second too late, allowing the clock to reach zero, and for it to focus a beam of concentrated light from the sky into the Super-Weapon. Nya is taken hostage, as the others fall off a cliff, barely surviving the fall. The Ninja have failed -- the final battle has begun.

programme.title: Thunderstox
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox encounters the sculptor. He helps unleash a horde of fierce garden gnomes on Knighton. What will the NEXO KNIGHTS do against this new enemy? Will their new COMBO NEXO Powers do the trick? As Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox head off on the Evil Mobile to 'store' the Forbidden Power in a secret location, they encounter…THE SCULPTOR. His real name is ROBERTO ARNOLDI. He's a sensitive and odd artist who has been laid off by the king (the King ordered a "smashing" statue of the Queen, and the Sculptor made a statue of the Queen literally smashing monsters. He takes everything very literally.) Jestro instructs him to make a "bad" statue that he can use to attack the knights. The Sculptor sets to work. Meanwhile, the NEXO KNIGHTS are discussing the COMBO NEXO Powers, the Forbidden Powers, and what all this means. Lance, meanwhile, decides that since his talk show career is on hold, he thinks he'll install cameras in the Fortrex and do a Big Brother-like expose show on the Knights (he decides NOT to tell the others.) Merlok 2.0 and the Cloud of Monstrox (each talking to their cohorts) explain the history of the Forbidden Powers: it's a history lesson about the WIZARDS' COUNCIL, the Forbidden Powers, and how they were stopped long ago. This visual montage leads Jestro to…MOUNT THUNDERSTROX. The Cloud of Monstrox shows him the circle of ten Standing Stones where he will insert the Forbidden Powers. "What'll happen after that?” asks Jestro, curious. "Oh, I don't want to spoil the surprise," says the Cloud. They insert the first Forbidden Power, Relentless Rust, and it locks into place on its stone. They go off to battle the Knights and collect the "bad" statue the sculptor is making. But he's made a literally bad statue…it's terrible ... garden gnomes. Like an amateur art student. And…it's not even finished. ("You can't rush bad genius!") The Knights attack with their newly modified vehicles and they succeed in destroying the Evil Mobile. They then try to use a COMBO NEXO Power, but can't…it had to be perfect to work (Ava and Merlok need to work on it.) As Jestro and the Cloud retreat, Merlok again talks to Clay about turning to stone! Merlok calls in Robin…he will need him to build something to help Clay as he becomes more and more impaired.

programme.title: Return Of The Overlord
programme.desc: When Garmadon uses his new Super-Weapon to turn Jamakai Village evil, he unwittingly unsettles the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possesses his body. Lord Garmadon witnesses the Super-Weapon come to life, revealing it to be ‘Garma-Tron', a giant moving cannon. His first test subject is Nya. Meanwhile, the heroes prepare for the final battle and sneak-attack Garmadon's compound…only to find it empty. The Super-Weapon is moving towards the coastline, where the cannon's range can reach Ninjago. On the way there, the Ninja must face off with Evil Nya, turned dark from the Super-Weapon. On the coastline, Lloyd battles his father atop Garma-Tron. The battle is fierce, but Lloyd fails at stopping his father from firing Garma-Tron, turning Jamanakai Village evil. Garmadon naively celebrates, not realizing he's undone the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possess his body. And as the Overlord continues to get more powerful, a hideous metamorphosis is taking place. Lloyd must fight the Overlord, and just when it looks like good will prevail, Lloyd is injured and thrown to the ground. In the end, the villains escape through a portal to Ninjago, and our heroes are abandoned on the island with no way home. And with the Green Ninja injured, it looks like all is lost. Evil has won.

programme.title: Rotten Luck
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox unleashes the Forbidden Power Ravaging Rot on Knighton! Turning everything into green gooey rot. But Robin has an awesome new invention that could help the NEXO KNIGHTS Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find a second Forbidden Power near the falling down Swamp Castle: RAVAGING ROT. With this power, they can make everything in the kingdom rot – food, vegetation, anything that grows or is natural. And that's exactly what they do! It's awful and makes everything stink. The Sculptor start to sculpt a portable HeadQuarter for his master, Jestro. Jestro expects it to be done when they return from ravaging the land. Axl is very concerned – he's into organic food ... and now food starts to rot. Merlok 2.0 and Ava are continuing to work on perfecting the COMBO NEXO Powers. We see display screens of MANY of the NEXO Powers. But there's a huge power consumption issue with these new-fangled combos. “I'll have to find an algorithmic power curve consumption solution, magic man,” says Ava. “I always just sort of choose them by, uh, feel.” “What do you feel like?” “Uh, a ham sandwich, a banana, and dragon fire,” responds Merlok. “That produced a combo with 2% efficiency,” says Ava. “This is why we have to actually THINK about and study perfec Combos. We need automatic power integration.” The Knights must stop Jestro from rotting all the food and living plant matter in Knighton and Axl leads the charge. But as they finally confront Jestro, who's trying to rot a field of beans near Fruitbridge, they're hit by his finally completed ROLLING HQ (the Sculptor is proud of the “artsy” elements.) … it's not exactly perfect though … he took the idea of Head Quarter a little too litteral and created a big head. Finally, in this conclusive battle where the knights get strapped on a rotting bridge, Clay emerges in a sleek, new BATTLE SUIT that Robin built for him because he was starting to have trouble moving around (the whole turning to stone thing.) It's smaller and more high-tech than the bigger Mechs of the past. Clay's able to drive Jestro off. Jestro, at the end of the episode, puts the Forbidden Power of Ravaging Rot into Mount Thunderstrox. Meanwhile, back at the Fortrex, Axl makes an organic food feast for all his fellow Knights.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic conquers Robotnik's latest evil - a vehicle designated to locate and destroy living tissue matter - during a solo mission to the Badlands. Upon Sonic's return, the Freedom Fighters honor him with a victory party.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When Robotnik launches a spy-orb that will uncover the Freedom Fighter's Knothole location, Sonic and Robot launch themselves up to the orbiting spy-sphere aboard a home-made rocket powered by Robotnik's discarded booster engine.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When Sally uncovers Robotnik's plan to seed the cloud with toxic rain, they attempt a daring mission to sabotage the dirigible-like craft being transported by land vehicles. Mission fails when Sally, Bunnie and Antoine are captured.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When Sonic and The Freedom Fighters take out Robotnik's main computer, they're trapped by Swat-Bots in an underground tunnel, only to be rescued by a handsome teenager named Griff. Griff takes them deep beneath the Big City.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik severely upsets the ecosystem above and below the surface, when he sends explosive, Robotnik snake probes drilling deep under ground in search of oil lakes.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Tails brings a new friend home to Knothole - a baby Terra-Pod who has strayed from the herd that is currently migrating. Sonic, Sally, and some of the other Freedom Fighters return the Baby-T to its mom and the rest of the herd.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic reluctantly takes Tails with him to the Big City to find some cotter pins for the Freedom Fighters catapults. While in the City, Sonic is nearly eaten alive by his old dog Muttski, now a roboti-sized guard dog in the Junk Heaps

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: The Freedom Fighters, with new addition, Dulcy, develop a De-Roboti-sizer and try it out on Bunnie. It's a success and, against Sally's wishes, Sonic battles Robotnik's newest weapon, a Virtual Reality Shriek-Bot.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: The Freedom Fighters run into a Swashbuckler, named Ari, battling Swat-Bots. Sonic diverts them, allowing Ari to escape. After hearing that Robotnik is holding his band of Freedom Fighters hostage, Ari decides to help Sonic free them.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: While lost in the wastelands of Mobius, Sonic, Manic and Sonia stumble upon an oasis called Lake Valley Resort.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sonia is invited to a debutante ball, but before she can be officially announced to society, she and her brothers, Manic and Sonic have an important mission.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Robotnik organizes a track meet to lure Sonic into a trap.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The Hedgehogs find out that Sonia has inherited a castle. She basks in the idea of having a castle for headquarters.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The Hedgehogs steal historical artifacts of Mobuis from Robotnik before he can pawn them off at an auction.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: When Eli and the Shane Gang find themselves trapped in the Deep Caverns underneath Slugterra they discover a whole new type of danger threatening to escape. Allowing it past the barrier would mean unprecedented peril - not only for Slugterra, but our world above too!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Armed with his powerful new weapon the Gatling Blaster, Blakk's unstoppable battle train threatens to run roughshod over all of Slugterra - unless Eli can master his new Double Barrel Blaster and come up with a powerful fusion move in time to stop it.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Shane Gang find themselves competing in the Slugball Championship - a rough and tumble cross between hockey, slugslinging and rugby - with deadly random obstacles thrown in for fun! Eli suspects the rival team is cheating, but he's going to have to prove it first... that is if he can survive the game!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Locke and Lode have run roughshod over a cavern and The Shane Gang aim to kick them out. But the townspeople have their own hero to clean up the town - none other than the King of Sling, a pompous Slugslinger the gang has bested on a number of occasions. There is no way he'll survive against two of Blakk's minions, but Eli can't intervene without humiliating the king! So the Shane Gang decide to work behind the scenes to make the king victorious. That is until Dr. Blakk himself arrives.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Shane Gang's been captured by the zombifying Mr. Saturday! Locked up in Stalagmite 17, they are helpless as Dr. Blakk begins the trip there to collect them. Only one hope remains... the two members of the Shane Gang Saturday didn't capture: Pronto and Burpy. Can this mismatched pair pull off an impressive prison break?

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Shane Gang follow Diablos Nacho to Molemound - the Molenoid home cavern. Pronto doesn't want to go - and not because he's in trouble. It turns out Pronto is the rightful KING of the Molenoids. He's been ducking the crown for years since the king's main responsibility is settling arguments and fixing leaky plumbing. But Pronto must play king for a day while the Shane Gang follows Nacho into the great Molenoid library to stop him from taking a valuable map.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Our heroes are lured into an elaborate game by a twisted villain calling himself the Game Master. The Shane Gang must use every bit of skill they have to pass each level, but there is a devious twist: every slug they fire is captured, with the promise that they'll see them again only if they manage to make it to the end. That's becoming all the more difficult with fewer and fewer slugs.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Burpy is sick, and the only thing that will cure him is a trip to the Lightwell - a mysterious, hidden power source only slugs (and the Shadow Clan) know the way to. Burpy can't make it on his own, so Eli vows to take him there. He convinces the Shadow Clan to point the way, but the journey is fraught with peril. Meanwhile the rest of the Shane Gang must fight side by side with the Shadow Clan when Blakk's minions attack.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: A mysterious creature is draining the energy from all the slugs in a distant cavern, and the residents are offering a rich reward to whoever can stop it. Mercenaries come out of the woodwork hoping for the prize, but the Shane Gang aim to stop it for free. That's what they do. It turns out this creature is more dangerous than anyone could imagine, and one by one, the hunters are taken out of the game-leaving only Eli and the reviled STOCKER remaining.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Dr. Blakk has been captured! Now it's up to the Shane Gang to transport him to Stalagmite 17, the only prison that can hold him. To do so, they're going to need some serious speed. That's just what they get when we reveal Kord's new modifications to their Mecha Beasts! But will it be enough to stand up to Blakk's own newly-designed super vehicles?

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: While the rest of the Shane Gang defend the perimeter from the legions of Blakk Guards sent to free Dr. Blakk from prison, Eli interogates the captured villain. Surprisingly, Blakk feels like talking. He reveals where he came from, how and why he discovered ghouls and most importantly of all, Eli learns the truth about what happened to his father.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Eli's got a new slug recruit! But in the heat of battle, can this rookie go from frightened novice to the hero of the day?

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Dr. Blakk and his Darkbane minions have discovered a way to make their ghouls faster and stronger - giving them an edge over the Shane Gang. In order to even the odds, Eli is going to need his most powerful slugs and an upgraded blaster from Redhook. The only problem is, Dr. Blakk already has the slingersmith working for him... Eli and the gang attempt a daring rescue mission to free Redhook, but along the way discover Blakk has a much more sinister plan in the works.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Dr. Blakk has succeeded in creating a gap in the magical slug-energy barrier that protects Slugterra, opening the way for the evil Darkbane to tunnel their way up from the Deep Caverns. Eli and the Shane gang must stop this at any cost. Now armed with a selection of upgraded slugs, blasters and armor, they take the battle to Dr. Blakk's front door. While his team slugs it out against Dr. Blakk's minions, Eli takes on Blakk himself once and for all!

programme.title: Anoki's Igloo, Fish, Lemons and Gherkins, An Exciting Fishing Trip
programme.desc: EP31: Tijinou and Tijibelle catch up with Anoki. His igloo is almost ready, it's just missing the roof. His friends want to help him lay down the roof but it's so heavy that only Super Hero is strong enough to carry it! EP32: Tijinou and Tijibelle are greeted by Anoki and Super Hero. Our friends have brought a basket full of food: honey for Bianca the little Bear, yellow for Anoki, and chicory and pickles for Dylan l'Élan, who just loves that! Mmm… EP33: When Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive on the ice, they hear laughter and joyous yelping!… It's Hot Dog the puppy playing with Bianca the little Bear around a picnic basket. But Anoki asks Tijinou and Tijibelle to deal with it because he promised Thunder Fairy to teach him to fish on the ice.

programme.title: Blippi's Summer Sleepover at the Zoo
programme.desc: Come along with Blippi for a camp out with jungle animals.

programme.title: The Berry Best Biscuit
programme.desc: Sour teasing Apple escalates into a "prank war" between the two of them. After the girls' feud disrupts the town, they are sentenced in a Berry Bitty City-style trial to camp alone together for a whole weekend. Miraculously, they emerge best buds, and their friends are relieved, until Sour's influence on Apple turns her into a mini-Sour, and they have to do a personality "makeover" on Apple.

programme.title: Hot Sauce Cook Off
programme.desc: Berrykin Bloom's braggart cousin, Berrykin Bertram, has won the hot sauce competition at the local county fair year after year. But this year, Sour and Apple are determined to help the kindhearted Bloom win... whether he wants to or not!

programme.title: The Secret Of Alfea -Winx Club
programme.desc: The Fairy Animals arrive to save Flora and the Winx, magically appearing in the Adamantine MiniWorld. For the Winx there is no time to waste, because, in the meantime, the Ultimate Power Diamond has flown out of the MiniWorld, looking for a keeper… and it has been taken by Kalshara first and then by Brafilius, who has absorbed it, summoning the most powerful magic animals in all the dimensions. In doing so, he has also freed the Trix, who easily turn Brafilius into a dog and force Kalshara to flee. Stronger than ever, the Trix use the Ultimate Power to besiege Alfea. Therefore, the Winx have to enter the Alfea MiniWorld to strengthen the magic source of the college, but on their way they bump once again into the Trix, who throw that fairy place into the dark…

programme.title: The Golden Butterfly -Winx Club
programme.desc: As outside of Alfea the fight between the Trix and the Alfea's fairies goes on, the Winx use their Stones of Memories to go back to Alfea in the past. The Winx meet Mavilla and young Faragonda, asking them to help them finding the Golden Butterfly, the only animal that can give light and energy again to the Heart of Alfea. Thanks to the Tynix power, the Winx enter the Flower MiniWorld bumping into the Trix, on the back of their magic animals: now, with the Ultimate Power in their hands, they can travel to any place linked to the Fairy Animals. To protect the Golden Fairy, Bloom is taken by surprise by Icy, who fires a magic blow against her to make her fall into an ice trap…

programme.title: Tall Tale Trio
programme.desc: When a comedy of errors causes Orange, Plum and Cherry to arrive late to their campout, they start off their annual tradition of telling tall-tales around the campfire by making up three outrageous, hysterical accounts of what held them up.

programme.title: Berry Big Tale-Teller
programme.desc: At the girls' campout, Sour launches into a whopper of a yarn about the adventures she and Sweet had in the "Berry Deep Dark Forest." She tries to get Sweet to participate in spinning the tale, but Sour's over-the-top performance leaves Sweet behind. Toward the end, Sour graciously changes the story to pull Sweet into it, giving Sweet the opportunity to toss in an ad lib that makes a nice topper to Sour's story. Sweet is thrilled when everyone applauds her, even Sour, who is impressed by her contribution and proud of her sister.

programme.title: Foods that start with Q
programme.desc: Can you name a food that starts with Q? Avery makes Quiche with Chef Jean-Jacques Texier. Lily visits a sheep farm to find out about a creamy, little known cheese called Quark. Back in the kitchen, they take on Matt's Quirky Quesadilla challenge.

programme.title: Foods for The Brain
programme.desc: Lily knows the smartest way to start the day is with a good breakfast, and meets Chef Donna Dooher to make Green Eggs and Ham. Avery visits a centre that researches fish. Matt keeps score as the two face-off with blueberry and strawberry deserts that help build brain power.

programme.title: On with the show, Percival Learns to Dance, Hide & Seek
programme.desc: EP22: Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive in Wonderland, welcomed by the princess and the Knight.EP23: oom! Boom! Boom! The ground shakes a little in the World of Enchantment : it's Percival the dragon who tries to learn how to dance with a balloonEP24: The princess is playing hide-and-seek and asks Tijinou and Tijibelle to help her find the Fearless Knight, and Percival the dragon.

programme.title: Percival makes a Present, A Surprise for Percival, A Day at The Circus
programme.desc: EP25: When Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive in Wonderland, they find Percival who has an idea for his mum's birthday: he wants to offer her a pearl necklace.EP26: Tijinou and Tijibelle meet the Fearless Knight. He brings a huge basket to the princess, because she is organising a surprise for Percival, the dragon.EP27: The puppy Hot Dog, Percival the dragon and Super Hero are plotting something with Rigolini the clown when Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive in Wonderland.

programme.title: It's A Crazy, Crazy World
programme.desc: The Winx decide to go back to Alfea with their Fairy Animals: in order to catch them, Kalshara has to find a way to enter the school for fairies. But, suddenly, the Winx are called by Roxy for an emergency: the weather in Ethiopia has gone crazy, threatening the cranes that migrated over there. Together with the Pixies, the six fairies get to Ethiopia, but then they have to use their Tynix power to enter the Sundial MiniWorld and sort things out. Before going back home, the Winx find a little Digmole that says it's searching for its own fairy, Faragonda!

programme.title: The Kingdom Of Diamonds -Winx Club
programme.desc: The Digmole the Winx show to Faragonda says it's bonded with the Alfea headmistress, but Faragonda has vague memories about it. Bloom explains that this could be due to the fact that the previous headmistress, Mavilla, cancelled all the memories of the Alfea fairies about the Fairy Animals. As they are speaking, Bloom has an intuition: she realizes that the animal with the First Colour of the Universe is the small statue representing a Digmole taken by Faragonda in the past as it is made of diamond, it reflects all the colours of light. The Winx shrink to enter the Adamantine MiniWorld and there they find a diamond that has the Ultimate Power, but a sudden collapse of the orchard-greenhouse buries Flora under a pile of rocks…

programme.desc: Blippi visits the Kennedy Space Center and learns about space!

programme.title: Gummy Bear and Friends
programme.desc: Follow the silly adventures of everyone's favorite singing and dancing animated gummy bear and his friends Kala the Cat and Harry the Chameleon

programme.title: Pirate school
programme.desc: On a small remote island surrounded by endless seas, a special Pirate School was opened, where children from pirate families study. Among them are Keel, Fuse and Bobo. The pirate origin does not relieve them from study and normal school duties.

programme.title: Fishtronaut
programme.desc: The series tells the story of Fishtronaut, a fish in a spacesuit, similar to reverse scuba gear, which allows him to fly and breathe out of water.

programme.title: The Pirates Next Door
programme.desc: A small town's quiet life is suddenly turned upside down by the arrival of a family of pirates! For Matilda, her new neighbors are a dream come true! With Jim Lad, the Jolley-Rogers' son, around, there's no chance of getting bored.

programme.title: Eddie's Wonderland
programme.desc: Festive programming to enjoy the holidays from Eddie's Wonderland!

programme.title: Tales of Tatonka
programme.desc: Share great laughs and thrilling adventures with Wanji, Nunpa, Yamni and Topa, four daring wolf-cubs. Our four heroes and their friends learn to grow together as a family and discover the world around them.

programme.title: Sparkle Power
programme.desc: Power through the day with some sparkle and shine!

programme.title: Winx Club
programme.desc: Winx Club is a fantasy saga revolving around six fairies and their adventures. The protagonists Bloom, Stella, Flora, Aisha, Tecna and Musa live their daily life on Magix world, among lessons, loves, quarrels and moments of strong friendship. At any moment, when needed, they can transform into super-heroines, ready to defeat evil and save who is in danger.

programme.title: LOL Block
programme.desc: A crazy collection of hilarious comedy series featuring shows like, Elvis and Benny, Eliot Kid, Angelo Rules, and, Kung Food!

programme.title: Eliot Kid

Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby

They were playing hide and seek but Felicia is such a good hider that she's refused to come out even though she's won the game.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Kiki wants to become a movie actress but the villagers have no idea how to direct a movie. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to turn into a movie director. She then assigns roles to the village friends. // Ling Ling rushes toward Rainbow Ruby to tell her that a busy villager mom asked him to take care of her three children but he just doesn't have time to look after them. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to transform into a babysitter and starts babysitting the children.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby

programme.title: Franklin and Friends
programme.desc: "Franklin and Friends," based on the children's book series featuring Franklin, is a computer-animated series geared toward preschoolers that aims to teach the kids lessons. The series follows Franklin the turtle, now older than in the books and previous TV series, as he experiences adventures and achieves milestones in the community of Woodland, learning lessons along the way. Franklin's friends referenced in the title include best friend Bear, problem-solving Snail, practical joker Rabbit, natural leader Beaver, inventive Fox and empathetic Goose. The series tackles issues that include personal empowerment, socialization, self-esteem, appreciation of nature and school issues.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When a game of Bumper Ball gets a little too heated, the friends start competing against their own teammates! But when a stray ball knocks open the sheep pen, they'll have to learn to work together to round up the sheep...and get back to the game! // Rev and his friends receive a map in pieces, so they race up separate mountain trails, vying to be first to claim the treasure at the top. But when there's no treasure in sight at the end, Rev's parents have some advice for finding the real reward.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and Avery set out to conquer a legendary endurance course, the course's challenges put their truck power to the test. But as they near the end, a call for help takes them off course-and straight into a rescue mission to save their heroes! // When Rev sees Lori working the quarry in secret, Lori asks Rev to keep it secret-she worries she isn't good enough, and dreams of working with the big quarry trucks one day. But when quarry workers need help, Rev has to convince Lori to save the day!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev can't wait to take Avery camping. But when he learns they're trying a new campsite for the first time ever, he is disappointed-what if the new campsite isn't as fun...or worse...boring?! It's up to Avery to get him excited for a new adventure! // Rev wants to be just like his dad, so he and Rumble attempt Ben and Duke's usual tasks. They're disappointed when they aren't strong enough to tackle the big jobs the way Ben would, but sometimes, a little Rev magic and Rumble power are even better!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev and Avery find a stray kitten, they put posters around to alert its owner. The owner arrives at the Gear Up Garage...just as the kitty vanishes! Rev and the gang set out to find the kitten, and Operation Kitten Care becomes Operation Rescue! // When Rev leads the gang in a fossil hunting expedition, they find an enormous skull! But when Molly breaks the news that they'll have to leave the skeleton for professionals to dig up, Rev wonders how he can still have a dinosaur of his own.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: It's Mudder's Day-everyone's favourite day of the year! The Stunt Park is filled with mud, and the whole town gets to drive through it. But Rev can't join them until he gets a gift for his Mom...and the stores are all closed for the festivities! // After Bo shows off his action-hero moves, Rev wants him to star in his film. Bu Bo freezes with stage fright as soon as Rev turns the camera on! Bo wants to be brave and come through for his friends, but how can he overcome his fear?

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and Rumble teach Bentley the puppy to play Hide and Seek! At first the pup doesn't get it...but soon Bentley's hiding so well, they can't find him! Can Rumble use Bentley's instincts to help them track down their puppy pal? // A big winter storm is headed for town...and it's Christmas Eve! What if Santa can't find them through the snow? Rev and the kids round up their own toys and deliver them to all the kids in town-just in case! But can they make it through the storm?

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Stuckey the garbage truck dreams of entering the Auto Show, so Rev and the gang clean him up for his big debut. But after saving his friends from danger, Stuckey winds up covered in mud all over again...just in time for his moment in the spotlight! // When Lori only receives two tickets to a movie premiere, her friends compete to see which one of them is her "best friend." But watching her friends compete only makes Lori feel terrible-she'd rather not go to the movie at all!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: As the Gear Up Grand Prix begins, each of the friends runs into problems and must drop out of the race. Soon, slow and steady Lori is the only one left standing! Cheered on by her friends, can Lori and Tipper find the confidence to win? // When the gang puts on a Chinese New Year play, they cast Rumble as the monster. He's a natural! But in rehearsal Rumble begins to worry that he'll be too scary for the audience on opening night. Rumble will need his friends to help him find his roar!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev asks to help beautify the town, he insists there's no job too tough! That is...until he finds out he'll be hauling stinky manure. Rev tries to pawn the job off, until Avery tells him the best way to get it done is to just... "doo-doo" it! // When the gang organizes a birthday party for Rev, Avery insists they keep it secret. After hiding Rev's gifts in a tree, they realize the presents are stuck up there and will need to be retrieved-all before Rev figures out what's going on!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Miss Dottie goes missing, Rev and Avery offer to return her to the Rancher's Jamboree! Rumble is star-struck by the show-sheep, until the unlikely duo become friends. Back safe, Miss Dottie takes the stage, this time with her new pal Rumble! // Rev is determined to master Rumble's new wrecking-ball attachment, but things quickly get out of hand when the duo refuse to ask for help. Now they'll need all the help they can get to stop the wayward ball from wrecking all of Fender Bend!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev's dad tells about him about treasure sunken in the pond, Rev and Avery set out on a pirate adventure! They outfit Rumble and Alley with new dive equipment to salvage the long-lost toys and cherished memories found within the chest. // When Rev's cousin Katie comes to visit, Avery's jealousy gets the best of her-Avery always thought she was the coolest girl Rev knew! Intent on outdoing Katie, Avery pulls a stunt that she comes to regret.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and the gang are painting a mural for Four-Wheeled Friendship Day! But with Avery in charge, the friends start to lose confidence in their work. She may be a master when it comes to art, but Avery has a lot to learn about being project leader! // When the pals befriend a mouse in the barn, Rumble can't resist breaking the rules by bringing the little guy a snack. Before long there are mice everywhere! Rev and Rumble will need to shoo away their tiny guests, before Mom and Dad find them!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev finds out that Bo wants to be a Police Kid, he tells a white lie to make him one for a day! Officer Bo takes the new job too far, ticketing everyone-for everything. Rev will have to tell the truth to fix this mess and get his friend back! // At Camp Sleepaway, Bo is homesick. His friends try to lift his spirits, but after a stinky trip to the outhouse, he's had enough! That is...until a suggestion from Rev helps Bo to see the beauty all around. Maybe camp isn't so bad after all!

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: In 1999, Kevin found himself in the real world with no real job skills and a strong desire to work an hour a day. What to do? Inspired by nights on the couch watching TV comedians, Kevin decided to head over to nearby Madison, WI and try the “Open-Mic Night”. Thirteen years later Kevin is still going on-stage, and he has found the job that fit his requirements. “For an hour a night I'm wildly successful”. With a smooth and clever style, a great smile and a contagious laugh Kevin has been entertaining in clubs and colleges across the country. In 2000 he was the winner of the Midwest region of the HBO “Comedy Competition” and flew to Los Angeles to compete as a finalist. He performed on Comedy Central's “Premium Blend” in 2003, and finished 2nd in the Boston Comedy Competition in 2005. He was a semi-finalist on NBC's “Last Comic Standing” in 2010. This past summer he co-starred in the Indie film “Flat Chested” starring Alicia Witt and Luke Perry. He currently resides in Chicago.

programme.title: Jay Stevens
programme.desc: Jay Stevens has been a professional comedian for almost 20 years. Growing up, he was known as a hilarious outgoing character by friends, family, colleagues and those he would meet on a first encounter.

programme.title: Kellen Erskine
programme.desc: Kellen Erskine was featured on season 7 of NBC's America's Got Talent. His jokes have appeared in many publications including the Reader's Digest. Kellen has been a finalist of both the San Francisco International Comedy Competition and the Great American Comedy Festival. This year he performed at the prestigious Bridgetown Comedy Festival in Portland, Oregon. Kellen opens regularly for Frank Caliendo of FOX's NFL Sunday.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.sub-title: Caleb Elliott: Diary of a Smooth Black Kid
programme.desc: One of DryBar's youngest comics, Caleb Elliot proves that age is anything but a setback.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Bill Campbell is not as young as he used to be. Egos are lost in translation, contact lenses are replaced by magic markers, and garage sales are negotiated cent-by-cent.

programme.title: David Crowe
programme.desc: David Crowe is a 20 year veteran of the comedy stage. After winning both the Seattle and San Francisco Comedy Competitions, then performing for a US President the same year, his career took off and has never stopped. On stage Crowe is armed with a "gallery of facial expressions", a host of accents and a "nerdy charisma that is utterly captivating." He has been featured on Showtime with his own One Hour Comedy Special "Crooked Finger," along with numerous appearances on Comedy Central, Bob&Tom Radio, SiriusXM and Pandora. Overseas, he crushed the competition at the Edinburgh International Fringe Festival garnering three perfect 5-Star reviews from their rather sticky and jaded press (you can read them here in the Testimonials section). David is a guaranteed hit on the corporate entertainment circuit. He has performed at literally hundreds of corporate and private events across the United States and Canada. (See "Past Client" list under Testimonials). He recently concluded a nationwide comedy tour for Investors Group, a financial services company, where he performed for over 60,000 of their most valued clients in 60 different cities. To date, David has released five comedy albums. He believes the best way to stay sharp and relevant is to continue to hone and perfect new material at comedy clubs across the country with the goal of releasing an new comedy special every few years.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Smooth. Clever. Hilarious. These words are often used to describe Sam Adams as a comedian, public speaker and Master of Ceremonies. In 2001, he stepped on stage to perform stand-up comedy for the first time, at age 41. Eight years later Sam turned to a career in comedy full-time after winning at the Great American Comedy Festival. Sam changed careers after making a name for himself as one of Denver's premier sports journalists. In 2003 was voted by his peers as Colorado's “Print Journalist of the Year.” As a reporter and columnist his work has been featured in The Denver Post, The Charlotte Observer, Rocky Mountain News and Colorado Avid Golfer magazine. Sam has also made numerous TV appearances on ESPN, Fox Sports, CBS, NBC and NFL Network. In 2013, he wrote a book, 'If You Don't Believe Me: Lessons Learned From Listening To The Greats,” giving readers an inside look at his 23-year career as a sports journalist.

programme.title: Collin Moulton
programme.desc: Collin is one of the most fun, personable, and sought after headliners today. He has had his own stand-up special on SHOWTIME, he's been on NICKELODEON, and was recently featured on LAST CALL WITH CARSON DALY. Touring for over 15 years Collin has gained an ease and enjoyment on stage that makes every show worth watching.America knows and loves him. His familiarity and energy engages and relieves the audience before he even speaks. His electric storytelling style makes you care about every topic he explores. Collin's comedy is the release needed from our every day lives. Come needing to laugh tonight, leave wanting to laugh forever!Collin Moulton
